step_original: Other certificates: Declaration to be provided for every consignment of kitchenware falling under the provisions of (EU) Regulation 284/2011, originating in or consigned from the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China and Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China
step_description:
If your polyamide or melamine plastic kitchenware is from China or Hong Kong, you must:
- tell the [Border Control Post](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-border-control-posts-animal-and-animal-product-imports/live-animals-animal-products-and-food-and-feed-of-non-animal-origin-border-control-posts-bcp-in-the-uk#approved-categories-keybrb) when your consignment is due to arrive in the UK, at least 2 working days before the estimated arrival date
- show a declaration and laboratory report confirming the goods meet the requirements for the release of primary aromatic amines and formaldehyde
